description: Beautiful and modern residential home with 3 bedrooms and a spacious garden. clean and bright room. The breakfast is fresh. Do not miss this opportunity and make an appointment quickly for a viewing of this beautiful home.residence with janitor, 2 bedroom apartment of 52. 12 sq.m., fully renovated and benefiting from high quality fittings. Entrance hall with walk-in closet, living room with fitted kitchen, 2 bedrooms, shower room and large 10. 5 sq.m. balcony.

Discover this superb, recently renovated, air-conditioned studio on the top floor of a prestigious palace. Its delightful terrace offers a partial sea view and an unobstructed view of the sought-after Cimiez district. Comprising 2 lots, this property includes a bright main room with fitted kitchen, a shower room with toilet and a second room equipped with washing machine, with the possibility of installing plenty of storage space. Sold furnished.
